DOC.detailed_description: The study enrol subject 12 14 month age subject 3 5 year age . Meningitec™ Mencevax™ ACWY vaccine serve active control . The study conduct two stage : The primary vaccination phase ( Study Stage 1 ) study include subject ; second ( booster/persistence ) phase study ( Study Stage 2 ) include subject active control group group prim select MenACWY formulation .
